users.name: Captain America
users.bio: Back when he was still a scrawny, 90-pound runt, Steve Rogers was determined to go to war and serve his country.

users.name: Iron Man
users.bio: A "cool exec with a heart of steel," Tony Stark is the invincible Iron Man, fighting for justice as a modern day knight in high-tech armor.

users.name: Black Widow
users.bio: One of the world's greatest spies and master of disguise, she's the legendary scarlet-haired NATASHA ROMANOVA, the BLACK WIDOW!

user.name: Captain America
user.bio: Back when he was still a scrawny, 90-pound runt, Steve Rogers was determined to go to war and serve his country.

tweets.message: When the mob and the press and the whole world tell you to move, your job is to plant yourself like a tree by the river of truth and tell the whole world: "No, you move."

user.name: Iron Man

tweets.message: Heroes are made by the paths they choose, not the powers they are graced with.

tweets.message:
Piper: Am I going to be alright?
Me: Baby, you're in a relationship with me. Nothing is ever going to be alright.
